com.jetdrone.vertx.yoke.core

Interface RequestWrapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRequestWrapper, GroovyRequestWrapper, JSRequestWrapper

    public interface RequestWrapper
    # RequestWrapper Interface to wrap request objects to language specific implementations. This is an internal interface and should not be used on a normal Yoke application.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      YokeRequest wrap(org.vertx.java.core.http.HttpServerRequest request, boolean secure, Context context, Map<String,Engine> engines, SessionStore store)
      For other language bindings this method can be override.

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        YokeRequest wrap(org.vertx.java.core.http.HttpServerRequest request,
               boolean secure,
               Context context,
               Map<String,Engine> engines,
               SessionStore store)
        For other language bindings this method can be override.
        Parameters:
        request - The Vertx HttpServerRequest
        secure - Is the server SSL?
        context - The request context a map where data can be temporarily stored during the lifespan of the request
        engines - the current list of render engines (this is an unmodifiable map)
        store - the current Session Store implementation
        Returns:
        an Implementation of YokeRequest
